params.name: charset
params.description: The character encoding in which the string is encoded.

examples.title: Simple URLDecode() example
examples.description: Shows how it takes an input of: %21 and returns: !

examples.title: Basic URLDecode() usage
examples.description: In this example we demonstrate taking a URL encoded message passed on the request context and displaying it decoded.

examples.title: URLDecode() in obfuscation
examples.description: In this example we demonstrate url encoding a password before it is encrypted, and then decoding it after it is decrypted.

examples.title: URLDecode() usage as a member function
examples.description: In this example we demonstrate taking a URL encoded message passed on the request context and displaying it decoded using the URLDecode() member function.
